name: Neosync
headline: Neosync is an open-source anonymization and synthetic data platform.
description: Neosync is an open-source platform that allows you to create anonymized or synthetic data and sync it across all environments for testing and machine learning. Companies in highly regulated industries such as FinTech, HealthTech, InsureTech and those with sensitive data can use Neosync to create production-like data to use for debugging and building features in lower-level environments without the security and privacy risk of using production data.

founders.name: Evis Drenova, Founder
founders.description: Evis is the CEO/Co-founder of Nucleus. Before Nucleus, he was one of the first Product hires at Skyflow, a data privacy and security company, and led Product and GTM for the Fintech market from Seed -> Series B. Prior to Skyflow, he was Head of Product at Truedata, a Managing Consultant at IBM and started his career in Enterprise Sales at Experian and Oracle. He was born in Albania, grew up in Boston and currently resides in San Francisco.

founders.name: Nick Zelei, Founder
founders.description: Nick is the CTO/Co-Founder of Neosync. Prior to Neosync, he was a Staff Software Engineer at Newfront, a new-age insurance brokerage where he built and managed the Platform Engineering team from Series B -> Series D. He grew up outside of Cleveland, Ohio and currently resides in San Francisco.

New
Announcing PII Detection and Anonymization
# Developers Deserve Better Than Mock Data
### Neosync anonymizes sensitive production data and syncs it across environments, giving developers safe, high-quality, representative data for local development and testing.
[Try for free*No credit card required.](https://neosync.dev/<https:/app.neosync.dev>)
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Watch Evis anonymize and sync data from production -> staging
Demo
Customers
### Trusted by hundreds of fast-growing companies worldwide
![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/images/logos/c2fo_logo.svg)
![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/images/logos/fellow_logo.svg)
![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/images/logos/fpllc_logo.svg)
![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/images/logos/chub_logo.svg)

![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/images/logos/siemens_logo.svg)
Platform
## A Powerful Platform that Integrates with your Data Layer
Neoysnc integrates with your database or object storage and anonymizes sensitive data, generates synthetic data and syncs it across environments. Giving developers high quality, production-like data that they can safely use locally.
![platform](https://neosync.dev/images/platform3.svg)
Testimonials
## Don't take our word for it, listen to our customers
Customers of all sizes, from high-growth startups to public companies use Neosync to anonymize their sensitive data and sync it across environments.
![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/images/logos/fellow_logo.svg)
"We used to have a manual process that would create mock data but it was always out of date, so we switched to Neosync. Now we anonymize our sensitive health data and sync it from production to staging so our developers can have safe data locally for testing. What used to take 2-4 weeks, now only takes 2 days.
![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Faustin.jpeg&w=256&q=75)
### Austin Chustz
Senior Engineer
![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/images/logos/alascologo.svg)
"We chose Neosync because of their focus on the developer workflow. Their APIs and SDKs, along with their Terraform provider made it easy to integrate into our workflow. Neosync is able to give the data security that we need for our production data while giving our developers high-quality data that allows them to build fast."
![cust_logo](https://neosync.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fbasti.jpeg&w=256&q=75)
### Sebastian Seitz
Director, Platform Engineering
Integrate
## Get Started in Minutes
Neosync has a clean, intuitive interface that makes it easy to get started.
/01
### Connect and Integrate your databases
Integrate your source and destinations databases. Neosync supports many databases and object storages platforms.
/02
### Configure your Schema and Transformers
Select which schemas and tables you want to sync then configure transformers that anonymize your data or generate synthetic data.
/03
### Subset your data
Subset your data using SQL queries to reduce your data size or to hone in on a specific data set. Neosync handles the relational integrity.
/04
### Sync your environments
Sync your anonymized and synthetic data across environments on a schedule or do it ad-hoc. Get logs for every job run.
Use cases
## Neosync is built for engineering teams
Whether you're a Developer, Data Engineer or AI/ML Engineer, Neosync can give you the data you need without the privacy and security risks.
[Try for free*No credit card required.](https://neosync.dev/<https:/app.neosync.dev>)
### 
Developers
Designed to help developers build, test and ship faster by anonymizing production data so you can safely use it locally.
### 
Data Engineers
### 
AI/ML Engineers
![Feature preview](https://neosync.dev/images/devarch.svg)
Platform
## Features to Protect your Data and Power your Workflows
Neoysnc has enterprise-grade features with a world-class developer experience that developers love.
Data Anonymization
Mask, redact, scramble or obfuscate sensitive data in code.
Synthetic Data Generation
Choose from 45+ pre-built Synthetic Data Transformers.
Orchestration
Full control over scheduling, retries back-offs timeouts and multiple destinations.
Subset
Subset your database using one or multiple SQL queries.
Custom Transformers
Create your own custom transformers in code.
Schema Initialization
Initialize your destination schema and run pre and post-job hooks.
Multi-Destination Syncing
Sync data to multiple databases and object storage.
Tools for Developers
Neosync ships with a CLI, SDKs & APIs and a Terraform module.
Data
## Supports Structured and Unstructured Data
Neosync supports structured data in relational databases and unstructured data in NoSQL databases.
[![NeosyncLogo](https://neosync.dev/images/blogs/struc.svg)Structured DataNeosync natively structured data held in relational databases or warehouses.](https://neosync.dev/<https:/docs.neosync.dev/connections/postgres>)[![NeosyncLogo](https://neosync.dev/images/blogs/unstruc.svg)Unstructured DataNeosync supports unstructured data in NoSQL databases or even free form text](https://neosync.dev/<https:/docs.neosync.dev/connections/mongodb>)
## Get started today in minutes
Join hundreds of companies using Neosync to deliver a better local developer experience with anonymized production data.
[Get startedNo credit card required.](https://neosync.dev/<https:/app.neosync.dev>)
![NeosyncLogo](https://assets.nucleuscloud.com/neosync/newbrand/logo_dark_mode.svg)

generated_description:
### Neosync: A Brief Overview 

**Mission**: Neosync aims to provide a robust, open-source platform dedicated to anonymizing and generating synthetic data. It allows companies, especially in sensitive sectors like FinTech, HealthTech, and InsureTech, to create safe, production-like datasets for testing and machine learning, without the risks associated with using real production data.

**Founded**: Established in 2023, Neosync is a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S22.

**Location**: Based in San Francisco, Neosync operates with a tight-knit team of three employees.

**Key Personnel**: Jared Friedman serves as the Group Partner, providing guidance and strategic insight.

**Product Overview**: 
Neosync offers a powerful platform that integrates seamlessly with existing data infrastructures. The core functionalities include:
- **Data Anonymization**: Mask, redact, or obfuscate sensitive data.
- **Synthetic Data Creation**: Generate realistic synthetic datasets with over 45 pre-built transformers.
- **Environment Synchronization**: Sync anonymized or synthetic data efficiently across different environments to maintain consistency.

**Customer Base**: Neosync is already trusted by hundreds of companies, ranging from high-growth startups to established public organizations. Clients have reported significant efficiency gains, reducing data preparation times from weeks to days.

**Why Neosync?**:
1. **Developer-Centric Focus**: Designed with developers in mind, Neosync offers APIs, SDKs, and Terraform modules to align seamlessly with existing workflows.
2. **Compliance and Security**: Address various regulations like GDPR and HIPAA, ensuring safe handling of sensitive data.
3. **Time Efficiency**: It transforms the traditionally tedious process of creating testing datasets into a streamlined task, allowing engineers to focus on building rather than preparing data.

**Current Initiatives**: 
- Continual updates to improve features and enhance user experience.
- Educational resources like documentation and a blog to keep users informed and engaged.

**Get Started**: Neosync offers a no-credit-card-required trial, encouraging potential users to explore its capabilities firsthand.

**Website**: For more information, visit their [official site](https://neosync.dev).

Neosync is poised for growth, reflecting a strong offering in the data management landscape, especially for sectors that tread carefully around privacy issues. If you’re coding in a regulated industry and need reliable testing data without the overhead of security risks, Neosync deserves a look.
